casebody.data:
MAHLER
v.
SMITHFIELD 43P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Phillip Ray Mahler, for Mahler, Phillip Ray. John D. Elvers, Attorney at Law, for Smithfield.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of January 2019 by Plaintiff for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
